item.title: EPISODE 30 - Poems and Short Stories by Silverlyn
item.author: Sales@be-jeweled.net
item.description:
Silverlyn started writing poetry at the young age of 12 while walking outside each night.
The sights and sounds of the Night fascinated her into writing about it's transforming beauty. Along this time, she also began studying philosophy and religion and was drawn to the the Earth-based paths.
Taking beliefs from Druidry, Paganism and Wicca, they have given her personal joy and power from then on; their themes reflected in many of her writings.
Silverlyn is now 40, still loves to write, is happily married and has two grown children and one new grandson. She lives in Wichita, KS with her two cats and two dogs.
item.itunes:author: Marissa Newman
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE 30 - Poems and Short Stories by Silverlyn

item.title: EPISODE 22 - A Short Story: The Burning Witch
item.author: Sales@be-jeweled.net
item.description: Bonus Podcast: A short story by Christopher A Goeben aka Lord Raven. Biography: My name is Christopher A. Goben. I am a solitary witch who lives by the old ways for the love of the Lord and Lady and the earth who is our mother. I am a freelance writer of Pagan and Native American Lore. I have written short stories such as "The Birth of Two Gods" and the "Wedge Between Man and Fairies". I also write Pagan and Vampire poems as well. I hope you enjoy my writings as they come to me from the Blessing of the "Old Ones". Blessed Be Unto You
item.itunes:author: Marissa Newman
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE 22 - A Short Story: The Burning Witch
